illustrationPage.title: Manage your schedule
illustrationPage.subText: Manage your medicine pills as you want,and you can choose when its done or choose it as it permenet medicine.

illustrationPage.title: Forgot to buy?
illustrationPage.subText: Not any more, you will be reminded to buy the medicine before it runout.

illustrationPage.title: No more foretting
illustrationPage.subText: if you took a nap or didnt hear the reminder dont worry, there is message will be sent to one of your closed person to remind you.
